title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app J-1
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app J-1

State Regulations
STATE OF NEW YORK: EXECUTIVE DEPARTMENT
STATE COMMISSION FOR HUMAN RIGHTS
STATE COMMISSION FOR HUMAN RIGHTS Case No. on the complaint of

Complainant, NOTICE OF APPEARANCE
-against-
Respondent. SIRS: PLEASE TAKE NOTICE that (name), the (complainant or respondent)
above named, hereby appears in the above-entitled proceeding, that I have been
retained as attorney for the said (complainant or respondent) herein, and that
I hereby demand service upon me of a copy of all subsequent written
communications or notices to said party in this proceeding (other than
subpoenas and subpoenas duces tecum). Dated: (town), New York
(date), 19

Yours, etc., (NAME OF ATTORNEY)

Attorney for

Office and P.O. Address: (Telephone Number)

To: New York State Commission for Human Rights
270 Broadway

New York 7, New York

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 9, Appendices, app
J-1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
